name: xcel_eda_tariff_selectionand_model_setup
display_name: Xcel EDA Tariff Selectionand Model Setup

arguments.name: elec_tar
choices: Non-Xcel Secondary General Low Load Factor

name_xml: Xcel EDA Tariff Selection and Model Setup
modeler_description_xml: Adds the .idf text for the selected Xcel Energy tariffs, sets the timestep to 15min so that the demand window and the timestep align, and sets the lifecycle costing parameters to use NIST 2012 inflation and fuel escalation numbers.  These NIST numbers will not affect the Xcel EDA results.
description_xml: Add the selected Xcel utility rate, as well as set the timestep and lifecycle costing parameters as required by the Xcel EDA program.
